source:
TEXT_BANGNA401_02266_SEQ_00The Vath keeneye seems very pleased with himself.
※The difficulty of this quest will be synced to your current level.
target:
TEXT_BANGNA401_02266_SEQ_00特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト受注クラス・ジョブ制限
ヴァスの塚のサーチャーは、どこか誇らしげだ。

source:
TEXT_BANGNA401_02266_SEQ_01The Convictors have been searching for a more potent firesand to power their newest cannons, and the Vath keeneye has taken it upon himself to solve their problem. After many tireless hours of trial and error, he has finally found the answer to their quandary; however, all these experiments have left him with no components to make more of his new blend. He asks that you go and gather some of these items and bring them back to him. Travel to Avalonia Fallen and the Smoldering Wastes to collect three branches of deadwood and three sacks of redsand.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
target:
TEXT_BANGNA401_02266_SEQ_01※本クエストには
「 レベルアジャスト受注クラス・ジョブ制限」が、
　設定されています。
　受注時と同じクラス・ジョブでのみ進行できます。

サーチャーから、聖フィネア連隊に依頼された火薬の素材の収集を頼まれた。アヴァロニア・フォールンで「」を3つ、スモーキングウェイストで「」を3つ、それぞれ入手しよう。

source: TEXT_BANGNA401_02266_SEQ_02<tab>You obtain three branches of deadwood and three sacks of redsand. Return to Loth ast Vath and deliver them to the Vath keeneye.
target: TEXT_BANGNA401_02266_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C2401 /var>を3つ、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C2501 /var>を3つ入手した。ヴァスの塚の「サーチャー」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C2401 /var>」と「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C2501 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_BANGNA401_02266_SEQ_03<tab>The Vath keeneye is elated to see you return with the items he has requested. In his excitement, he launches into an explanation on how his firesand is created, but stops himself when he realizes divulging the secrets of this process to you could jeopardize future sales.
target: TEXT_BANGNA401_02266_SEQ_03<tab>サーチャーに、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C2401 /var>と<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C2501 /var>を渡した。彼によると、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C2401 /var>を混ぜ込むことで、火薬の爆発力を高めるらしい。このように優れた技術を外界と交換し合えば、お互いが発展していけるだろうと、彼は考えているようだ。

source: TEXT_BANGNA401_02266_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the deadwood branches and redsand to the Vath keeneye.
target: TEXT_BANGNA401_02266_TODO_02<tab>サーチャーに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C2401 /var>と<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C2501 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_BANGNA401_02266_SEARCHER_000_000<tab>Lately, the Convictors invest much of their gil in the construction of larger cannons. <click> <click> However, they are not satisfied with their performance. Not satisfied at all.
target:
TEXT_BANGNA401_02266_SEARCHER_000_000シシシシシ……ヒトの冒険者よ、
ヒトは、巨大な対竜カノン砲を作る技術を持っていながら、
火薬というものには、あまりに無頓着なようだな。

source: TEXT_BANGNA401_02266_SEARCHER_000_001<tab>To fire a single round, three times the normal amount of firesand is required. This is far too much! We offered to help our friends find a better alternative. So, between commissions, we spent much time experimenting.
target:
TEXT_BANGNA401_02266_SEARCHER_000_001なぜなら、聖フィネア連隊の火薬は、
小型の火砲に使うならともかく、カノン砲用には爆発力不足なのだ。
そこで私が手を加えてやったら、射程が伸びたと喜ばれてな。

source: TEXT_BANGNA401_02266_SEARCHER_000_002<tab>Finally, success! <click> <click> We created a new firesand mixture much more potent than the old! But there is a problem. During our research, we exhausted our supply of some essential components.
target:
TEXT_BANGNA401_02266_SEARCHER_000_002それからというもの、火薬の調合の依頼が来るようになった。
今回は、その素材集めを協力してもらいたい。

source: TEXT_BANGNA401_02266_SEARCHER_000_003<tab>We need three bags of redsand from Avalonia Fallen and three pieces of deadwood from the Smoldering Wastes. Please, great adventurer, can you go and fetch them for us?
target:
TEXT_BANGNA401_02266_SEARCHER_000_003アヴァロニア・フォールンで「」3袋ぶんと、
スモーキングウェイストで「」を3つ、
収集してきてくれ。

source: TEXT_BANGNA401_02266_SEARCHER_000_010<tab>You have returned! <click> <click> Did you bring the redsand and deadwood?
target:
TEXT_BANGNA401_02266_SEARCHER_000_010シシシシシ……戻ったのだな。
とを、取ってきてくれたか？

source: TEXT_BANGNA401_02266_SEARCHER_000_011<tab>After your long journey, you must be keen to know more about this process! You see, redsand, when combined with the charcoal produced from this deadwood in the precise ratio will─
target:
TEXT_BANGNA401_02266_SEARCHER_000_011ありがたい、恩に着るぞ。
このを木炭にして、と混ぜる。
それを、聖フィネア連隊から得た火薬に添加すれば完成だ。

source: TEXT_BANGNA401_02266_SEARCHER_000_012<tab>Oh, how foolish of us! It is not our place to share such valuable secrets, even with a friend... <click> <click> We will only say that the resulting compound has the ability to increase the explosive power of firesand.
target:
TEXT_BANGNA401_02266_SEARCHER_000_012は、かつてドラゴン族が一帯を焼き払った際に、
生じたものと思われる強い火属性を帯びた物質でな。
これを混ぜ込むことで、爆発力を高めるのだよ。

source: TEXT_BANGNA401_02266_SEARCHER_000_013<tab>You look surprised. Why, mighty hunter, you should know best of all that ingenuity is the greatest by-product of individuality! We can accomplish much by continuing to explore the world around us and trading our newfound knowledge with your kind!
target:
TEXT_BANGNA401_02266_SEARCHER_000_013どうだ、グナース族の技術も侮れないだろう？
こうして優れた知識と技術を、外界の者たちと交換し合えば、
お互いに発展していけることだろう……シシシシシ。
